segments.text: What a ridiculous scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't she hear the water gushing out of the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the floor, and she's knee-deep in ignorance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting ruined by all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now the kids are making it worse, climbing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that wobbly stool, stealing cookies no less.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got no business up there; it's dangerous and naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl egging him on, hand out like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is infuriating; someone's going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, mocking this disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so careless with the children around?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unfold without intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so preventable, yet here we are.
segments.speaker: PAR
